Package dj2.core

Provides the core class of the music player DJ2

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Performable
    Contains play and get title methods
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Album
    It is an album that contains relevant information of albums, and list of songs that are part of this album
    Artist
    Creates an artist with all information related to him, in addition to his singles, concerts, and albums
    Band
    Creates a band with all information related to it, in addition to the band's singles, concerts, and albums
    Concert
    It is concert that contains relevant information of real world concerts, and list songs that are played by the artist at the concert
    LinkedList<T extends Performable>
    Implements a doubly linked list, with the typical linked list method, and playing the linkedlist.
    MusicTrack
    This class is an abstract , is a class responsible of providing attributes and methods that shared between other types of tracks.
    Node<T extends Performable>
    The Node that makes elements which the linked list is made of
    PlayList
    A playlist, that the end user would be able to define and add any type of songs to it, and classify them by different titles
    Queue<T extends Performable>
    Implements a Queue using a doubly linked list, with its typical methods
    RecentlyPlayed
    A recently playedlist, gets created automatically in the music player, which add songs based on the last one played.
    TrackAlbum
    It is a album track, this is a subclass of MusicTrack
    TrackConcert
    It is a concert track, this is a subclass of MusicTrack
    TrackSingle
    It is a single track, this is a subclass of MusicTrack
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Style
    Contains the majority of music styles

Package dj2.core Description

Provides the core class of the music player DJ2
Since:
1.0
See Also:
java.awt
